p: The formalin test is commonly described in acute inflammation tests; however, repeated application was described in the studies of Jeena et al. [ 26, 35]. The inflammatory process is a result of tissue and functional alterations in the tissue accompanied by the release of inflammatory mediators such as histamine, prostaglandins, nitric oxide, and cytokines. To evaluate this, the authors monitor the reduction of edema and perform dosage of the involved mediators [ 26, 35, 78, 79].
